interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes by UJM，3 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Mirror and Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes Set
Review Date: 2020/09/07
Store: UJM
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4 x 4 x 0.3 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 0.3 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-004'}
Review Text: Oh these are rough. They look extremely false when on, and are very clunky. The magnetic eyeliner makes it harder to apply and keep these on. Also, if you get the eyeliner in your eye, you better have an eyewash station nearby. These are almost like toy false lashes for kids to play dress up with if the eyeliner wasn’t so toxic. The lashes (3 sets) come stacked in a compact that just feels breakable and not well made. The lashes themselves are very synthetic, and not natural looking at all. I like that the kit includes an eyelash tweezer applicator, but honestly that will be the only thing getting use from this kit. It’s a great concept, just poorly executed. The liner goes on and you have to quickly get the lashes placed, or you’ll lose adhesiveness by the second. Even when done in a timely manner, the magnetic components in the eyeliner don’t work well with the magnetic strip on the lashes, so they won’t stay on long. They are large and clunky and just look very unnatural, even when trimmed. The lashes themselves have a wire look and consistency to them, and look very similar to the lashes on a toy doll, only thicker and heavier looking. Would not recommend these, even for the low price.
Review Title: Very synthetic look and feel
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz
MELARQT
{'Brand': 'MELARQT', 'Item Form': 'Scrub', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.09 x 2.01 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '810042384002'}
This face wash is so exfoliating and smells great. It works really well on the beard area and preps the skin for a nice, super smooth shave. It doesn’t seem to strip the face of natural oils, which is great. Overall, it just leaves a really soft, clean, oil-free (the bad oils) look and feel. I would definitely recommend this for a nice clean face, especially for men with bushy beards.
Great for a soft clean face & beard
Magnetic Eyelashes by UJM，3 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Mirror and Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes Set
UJM

Oh these are rough. They look extremely false when on, and are very clunky. The magnetic eyeliner makes it harder to apply and keep these on. Also, if you get the eyeliner in your eye, you better have an eyewash station nearby. These are almost like toy false lashes for kids to play dress up with if the eyeliner wasn’t so toxic. The lashes (3 sets) come stacked in a compact that just feels breakable and not well made. The lashes themselves are very synthetic, and not natural looking at all. I like that the kit includes an eyelash tweezer applicator, but honestly that will be the only thing getting use from this kit. It’s a great concept, just poorly executed. The liner goes on and you have to quickly get the lashes placed, or you’ll lose adhesiveness by the second. Even when done in a timely manner, the magnetic components in the eyeliner don’t work well with the magnetic strip on the lashes, so they won’t stay on long. They are large and clunky and just look very unnatural, even when trimmed. The lashes themselves have a wire look and consistency to them, and look very similar to the lashes on a toy doll, only thicker and heavier looking. Would not recommend these, even for the low price.
Very synthetic look and feel
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Preference:** Strong interest in effective facial cleansing and exfoliation products tailored for men's skincare, particularly for those with beards.
- **Product Features:** Values natural ingredients and products that maintain skin hydration while removing impurities.
- **Performance Expectations:** Seeks products that provide a deep cleanse without stripping the skin of essential oils; prioritizes those that enhance the shaving experience.
- **User Experience:** Desires products that offer a pleasant scent and contribute to a soft, clean complexion free from excess oil, specifically for acne-prone skin.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Shows a preference for brands that specialize in men's skincare solutions and deliver high-quality results, as indicated by a high satisfaction rating.

- **Recent Interaction:** The user recently purchased a magnetic eyelash kit but expressed significant dissatisfaction. They found the product to have a very synthetic look and feel, resulting in a negative experience. The user highlighted issues with the product's application and adhesion, indicating a preference for natural aesthetics even in beauty products. This may suggest an evolving interest in exploring grooming tools beyond skincare, but with a strong emphasis on natural appearance and quality.

The user is likely to continue seeking men’s skincare products that emphasize natural ingredients, effective cleansing, and beard care, while also being discerning about the quality and natural appearance of grooming and beauty products.
